results.title: At 71, She’s Never Felt Pain or Anxiety. Now Scientists Know Why.

media.caption: Standard 737 Max planes are not equipped with a so-called angle of attack indicator or an angle of attack disagree light. The indicator will continue to cost airlines extra, but the light won’t.
